channel.title: How do I make it so you can attack a banker instead of bank and talk to?!?!
channel.description: I'm using tos scape (I renamed it Kool-Skape) and I tryed EVERYTHING! and I can't figure out how The IDS i want you to be able to kill are 494,495 I want it so Attack is a option,instead of Bank and Talk To

item.source: How do I make it so you can attack a banker instead of bank and talk to?!?!

item.title: How do I make it so you can attack a banker instead of bank and talk to?!?!
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

You can not have attack and bank on a single npc. That is not supported. However, you can make a specific npc bankable. Example: use aubury as a banker. If you do that you can attack bankers. But having the ability to attack and bank is not possible. [br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2006, 06:47:43 PM[/size][hr]To be able to attack it go to clienthandler.java and press ctrl+f type 494. From there you can delete the bank option and change it to attack.

Read full topic
